name: PROB_LNKSRC_ORL
description: This table contains problems from a patient's problem list along with linked surgical logs and surgical procedures suspected of causing the problems.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LNK_SRC_ORL_ID
columns.description: The linked surgical logs suspected of causing the problem.

columns.name: LNK_SRC_PNL_NUM
columns.description: The linked surgical log panels containing surgical procedures suspected of causing the problem.

columns.name: LNK_SRC_ORP_ID
columns.description: The linked surgical procedures suspected of causing the problem.

columns.name: LNK_SRC_ORP_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: LNK_SRC_OPE_ID
columns.description: The procedure additional data records for the linked source surgical procedures suspected of causing the problem.
